compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - consent, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: We will in no event sell, change, and/or rent your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation, Purpose Limitation, Lawfulness, Fairness, and Transparency

compliant.section: We will only share your personal information outside our Company with your consent in advance, as required by law.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of Processing, Conditions for Consent

compliant.section: If you have any question or suggestion regarding this Privacy Policy, please kindly contact to us.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject

non_compliant.section: Our Company hereby declares the Privacy Policy as below. By visiting our Company’s website, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Explicit consent in relation to special categories of data
non_compliant.amend: The company should make it clear that users have the right to withdraw consent at any time and that simply visiting the website does not constitute consent for data processing. Consent should be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous, potentially through a clear affirmative action like ticking a box.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Purposes of processing for which the personal data are intended
non_compliant.amend: The company should clearly state the specific purposes for collecting personal data, the legal basis for processing, the recipients of the data, the data retention period, and the data subject's rights. They should also specify if data is transferred internationally and the safeguards in place.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data - purpose limitation, data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: The company should specify the exact purposes for using personal information and ensure that data processing is limited to what is necessary for those specific purposes.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Right of access by the data subject, Right to rectification, Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability, Right to object, Automated individual decision-making, including profiling
non_compliant.amend: The policy should be written in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language. It should also explicitly mention the data subject's rights regarding their data, including the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, object to processing, and not be subject to automated decision-making.

non_compliant.section: Our website has security measure to protect your personal information and the website, such as firewalls and anti-virus systems.
non_compliant.amend: This statement is too general.  The GDPR requires controllers to implement "appropriate technical and organisational measures" to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.  The policy should specify the measures in place beyond firewalls and anti-virus software, or at least state that it takes a risk-based approach to data security.

non_compliant.section: Our Company is not responsible for any third party site is linked to our website or other website of our Company, including without limit Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR has a broad scope and may apply to third-party websites depending on the nature of the link and the data processing activities. The company cannot simply disclaim responsibility for third-party sites. It should instead provide clear and specific information about its data processing activities in relation to third-party sites, including the legal basis for any data transfers and the safeguards in place to protect personal data.

non_compliant.section: Our Company has right to change this Privacy Policy at any time. By visiting our website, you agree to accept such change.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: Users must be informed of changes in an appropriate and timely manner, and consent must be explicit, freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. Simply visiting the website does not constitute valid consent.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Contact details of the controller
non_compliant.amend: While providing contact information is good, the policy should explicitly mention that this is the contact information of the data controller and/or Data Protection Officer (DPO), if applicable.
